example.text: Men in hard hats doing roadwork.

example.text: A man in an yellow vest doing roadwork with another man for the State of Florida.

roleset.note: Roadwork-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry work.01 and fieldwork.01. Likely only LVC usage is truly eventive. Arguments such as ‘employee’ and ‘coworker’ may be unlikely but are grammatical. Examples including both are found in COCA and on google. Args 2 and 3 were retained to be consistent with work.01. Use work.01 when ‘roadwork’ is NOT a single word. Framed by Katie.
